it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.player.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.util.Observable
    Class that represents the model of the Player in our implementation
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari
